remarks.para: May be inoperative, damaged or missing provided that item(s) is deferred in accordance with operator's NEF deferral program. NEF program, procedures, and processes are outlined in the UPS General Maintenance Manual (GMM). (M) and (O) procedures, if required, must be available to flight crew and included in operator's appropriate document.

note.para: Exterior lavatory door ash trays are not considered NEF items.

placard.para: Placard as applicable per AMC instructions.
